items.sentence: When the fire broke out, Tom was fast asleep.

I wonder why Tom wanted to buy that for Mary.
Tom couldn't get Mary to tell him her secret.
If you want somebody to help you, go ask Tom.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice were all very busy.
Tom will be out of the office for three days.
Tom has come back to Australia for Christmas.
